Author: paraphrasis
Text: Personally I gained quite a lot of weight from chewing and spitting, BUT I did have very very big c/s binges, many times a week. I don’t think the calories are negligible, because it’s often hard not to swallow something. But you definitely do not ingest anything close to what you would if you ate it. Also depends on the kind of food of course. It’s a horrible horrible slippery slope though.

Author: jeykehey
Text: technically it will be less but depending on how bad you are at not swallowing it may not be a significant difference. plus it fucks with your stomach and is quite addictive so i really dont recommend it.
